message.body: Hey - didn't you make yoga cards at some point? Do you still have any?

Hey! I did them as 5x7 art prints. But I've had requests for them as cards. Would you be down if I did them smaller in the future? And if you want some of the 5x7s, I would give you a "lifelong friend" discount.
Ah ok! I specifically need cards for a couple yoga teachers, but actually, the prints would be great gifts! How much for 2 of em?
Yeah PayPal works! What color? Both updogs?
Sold, thanks! Want me to PayPal you? Let me know how much with shipping etc? Thanks dee!
I have black red blue and pink
Oh geez decisions - how bout a red and a pink? Any posture! xo
I'll do two updogs, I like them better
